document_data.name: Aelbronter Dauntrael
document_data.mainbody: '''Aelbronter Dauntrael''' was a member of the [[Dauntrael]] clan as of {{yearlink|1370}}.
document_data.History: He was knighted around {{yearlink|1370}}, for his work in reorganizing the lines of communication in eastern [[Tethyr]].
